thread.title: BRITs 2017: Little Mix's Jade Thirlwall threatens crotch flash in thigh-skimming gown
thread.title_full: BRITs 2017: Little Mix's Jade Thirlwall threatens crotch flash in thigh-skimming gown

title: BRITs 2017: Little Mix's Jade Thirlwall threatens crotch flash in thigh-skimming gown
text:
BRITs 2017: Little Mix's Jade Thirlwall threatens crotch flash in thigh-skimming gown BRITs 2017: Little Mix's Jade Thirlwall threatens crotch flash in thigh-skimming gown JADE Thirlwall and her Little Mix bandmates know how to work a red carpet. / Published 22nd February 2017 
While all four girls looking stunning at the BRIT Awards 2017 red carpet, it was Geordie Jade who stole the show by seemingly going without any underwear. 
Wearing a floor-length satin gown, the brunette struggled to maintain her modesty thanks to a waist-high slash. 
As she arrived on the red carpet, the 24-year-old kept a hand firmly in place over her privates. 
PA CAREFUL: Jade Thirlwall risked a wardrobe malfunction at The BRITs 
PA GIRL BAND: Little Mix stole attention on the red carpet Celebs revealing no knickers Monday, 23rd January 2017 A fun picture collection of celebrity wardrobe malfunctions, featuring Essex's Pascal Craymer, Rita Ora, Paris Hilton and Stephanie Davis all without their knickers. Oops. 1 / 68 iCelevTV / Instagram Charlotte Dawson exposes privates in knickerless reveal 
Posing, Jade stuck one tanned leg out à la Angelina Jolie – but not too far so as to not flash too much. 
She accessorised the white gown with a pair of long leather gloves and perspex heels. 
And upon further inspection, as Jade turned to the side, it was clear she did have knickers on – but barely. 
Next to her, Perrie Edwards wore an all black get-up, consisting of a leather bodice and feathered skirt and train. 
GETTY RISQÉ: Jade risked a serious wardrobe malfunction Little Mix sexiest pictures Monday, 12th December 2016 Pop sensation Little Mix love to flaunt their amazing figures whilst they are performing on stage and appearing at events. 1 / 47 Little Mix perform at the X Factor Final 
GETTY SNEAKY: Jade was actually wearing knickers – but barely 
She kept her long blonde hair simple, just slicked down and in a stylish braid to one side. 
Leigh-Anne Pinnock seemed to take inspiration from the 1990s and went for a distressed denim dress. 
The patchwork design clung tightly to her hourglass frame and she flashed plenty of flesh too thanks to the tied holes and worn edges. 
MIKE MARSLAND/WIREIMAGE BOMBSHELLS: Little Mix all had different styles for the red carpet The BRIT Awards 2017: Red Carpet Wednesday, 22nd February 2017 Take a stroll down the BRIT Awards Red Carpet 1 / 96 
Redhead Jesy Nelson went for a dominatrix inspired ensemble and risked overexposure thanks to a slit right up the middle. 
The gown was held together by a zip at the front, meaning any handsy prankster could cause her to have a serious wardrobe malfunction.
